name: Reloading
entries: At 7th level, you become extremely quick at reloading your firearms. You now gain these benefits:

entries.name: Clip
entries: You can now load an entire Clip as an Action.

entries.name: Barrel
entries: You can now load a number of shots into your barrel up to your Dexterity Modifier as a Bonus Action.

entries.name: Belt
entries: You can now reload a belt weapon with a loaded belt as a Bonus Action.

entries.name: Drum
entries: You can now load an entire drum in 1 minute.
